stories.text:
Idea: turn anything you see on the web into sharable story in a few mouse clicks.

Purpose: everyone is "creative", help them turn anything they see on the web into a great story sharing with others.

Prototype Demo: https://youtu.be/k-PLM5M_h_w

(note: could start with structured data, possibly employ AI to extract unstructured data for analysis in future)

Ask: 1. Is this idea worth further development? 2. Have you seen any potential use cases of it? 3. Are you interested in trying it when MVP/v1 is ready? If yes, would you like to share your email for contact.

Appreciate any comments/feedback, it helps me to decide what to build, reach out cao@columns.ai
stories.title: Feedback: Will a chrome extension like this be useful?
